method.name: SetHostnameIpMapping
method.tp:docstring: This method takes a hostname, IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and will set that mapping in the name resolution service. Either IP address may be empty, but not both. Currently only IPv4 is supported.

method.name: RemoveHostnameIpMapping
method.tp:docstring: This method takes a hostname and will remove that mapping from the name resolution service if it was previously set.
